tickets.title: Password Reset Request
tickets.description: User John.Doe@company.com cannot access his account after vacation. Multiple failed login attempts.

tickets.title: Laptop Performance Issues
tickets.description: Marketing team laptop (Asset #LAP-MKT-045) running extremely slow. Takes 10+ minutes to boot, applications freeze frequently.

tickets.title: Software Installation Request
tickets.description: Development team needs Adobe Creative Suite installed on 5 workstations for new project.

tickets.title: Network Connectivity Issues
tickets.description: Conference Room B cannot connect to WiFi. Multiple users affected during important client meetings.
tickets.resolution_notes: WiFi access point firmware updated and range extender installed.

tickets.title: Email Server Outage
tickets.description: Company-wide email service down. Users cannot send or receive emails since 9:00 AM.
tickets.resolution_notes: Exchange server restarted and service restored. Root cause: memory leak in mail service.
